message.body: So how's it looking for coming home today?
I have too much to do! I'll drive down tomorrow am, I think Richard will stay here. Dinner with girls tomorrow night.
Ok we'll see you when we see you & I won't worry about cooking too much. Let me know how things are going & have a safe trip. Supposed to be 70 tomorrow!
Ok! I'll keep you posted, I think I'll get there around lunchtime tomorrow. How's dad?
Doing better.... Came home yesterday looking very slow & shakey but he looked a little better this am. It takes time to get stuff out of your system
